Srivastava R ,

Spencer D , et al. HLA‐A02:01‐restricted epitopes identified from the herpes simplex virus tegument protein VP11/12 preferentially recall polyfunctional effector memory CD8+ T cells from seropositive asymptomatic individuals and protect humanized HLA‐A*02:01 transgenic mice against ocular herpes. J Immunol. 2015; 194: 2232‐ 2248. 25617474
